definition: one of the horny ribs that stiffen and support the wing of an insect, make a veinlike pattern
details:
noun
- one of the horny ribs that stiffen and support the wing of an insect
= synonyms: nervure
- a blood vessel that carries blood from the capillaries toward the heart
= example: a blood vessel that carries blood from the capillaries toward the heart
= synonyms: venous blood vessel
- a distinctive style or manner
= example: a distinctive style or manner
- a layer of ore between layers of rock
= synonyms: mineral vein
- any of the vascular bundles or ribs that form the branching framework of conducting and supporting tissues in a leaf or other plant organ
= synonyms: nervure
verb
- make a veinlike pattern
